body_html:
Sure, for my own purposes I can just edit the FROM line and rebuild.

I think an argument could potentially be made that if the purpose of the developer images is primarily to enable building TensorFlow, it would make sense to try to configure those images in a way that the resulting binaries are compatible with as wide a collection of systems as possible, which isn't true if they are linked against libc 2.23. But if you guys feel differently, no problem and thanks for your help.

body:
Sure, for my own purposes I can just edit the FROM line and rebuild. 

I think an argument could potentially be made that if the purpose of the developer images is primarily to enable building TensorFlow, it would make sense to try to configure those images in a way that the resulting binaries are compatible with as wide a collection of systems as possible, which isn't true if they are linked against libc 2.23. But if you guys feel differently, no problem and thanks for your help.
